resources.string: Inglês
Cleusa
No ensino do inglês, o elemento cultural dessa linguagem serve para:
Entender que cada linguagem representa uma visao diferente
Mostrar a falta de cultura do Brasil
Enfatizar que a cultura britânica é superior às outras
Ensinar inglês com o sotaque de um falante nativo
Qual das alternativas apresenta apenas adverbios de tempo?
lately, still, next, finally
first, here, rarely, yet
already, always, then, above
first, already, usually, yet
Chamar a atenção ao gênero de um texto no ensino da leitura serve para:
Focalizar o texto como organização significativa
Facilitar a leitura oral do texto
Deve ser evitado uma vez que textos não tem gênero
Induz o aluno a ler o texto de forma errada
Em qual das alternativas a seguir o advérbio esta INCORRETO?
Jamie is waiting for us always
They work very hardly on Fridays
We were rather hot yesterday
She hasn\'t met them yet
Assinale a alternativa que expressa uma comparação de igualdade.
Brazilians are as technology-hungry as anywhere in the world
You used to wait years to have a telephone installed
We are the worlds leading producer
We are the worlds largest producer of sugar
Qual frase traz exemplos de graus de comparação?
Making computers cheaper and faster and more powerful
Within a decade we will likely see chips with 100 cores
And now we are changing to a different model
Neither, in fact, are the programmers themselves
In my opinion, Goiania is \n_________________\ncity in Brazil.
the most beautiful
beautifuller
more beautiful
the beautifulest
Chose the alternative with the same meaning as:\nHe will talk to his brother after school.
He is going to talk to his brother after school
He going to talk to his brother after school
He is going talk to his brother after school
He going to talk his brother after school
Qual o melhor jeito de responder a: \nWhat are you going to do?
I am going to call the police
I travel to Los Angeles
I do my homework
We will think about it last week
A: Would you like some more whisky?\nB: Yes, you ___________ it.
have already drunk
have already drink
have already drinking
already drink
